channel.title: Organization on DDoSecrets Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Organization on DDoSecrets Wiki

item.title: Assangeleaks
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets AssangeLeaks AssangeLeaks The documents published today include chat logs, contracts, and financial information covering early years in the Assange organization. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRY TYPE Leak SOURCE FILE SIZE 25 MB DOWNLOADS MAGNET Link TORRENT Link DIRECT DOWNLOAD Link MORE REFERENCES EDITOR NOTES With the Justice Department’s superseding indictment against Assange, public access to the evidence becomes critical. The documents in this file illuminate that case and illustrate how WikiLeaks operates behind closed doors.

item.title: Bradley Foundation

Retrieved from “https://ddosecrets.com/index.php?title=Bradley_Foundation&oldid=2129” Categories: Organization Allegations of State Sponsorship United States of America

item.title: Citizengo
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE CitizenGo Over 17,000 documents hacked from right wing campaigning organizations Grupo CitizenGO & HazteOir hacked by ACABGang. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRIES TYPE Hack SOURCE ACABGang FILE SIZE 24 GB DOWNLOADS (How to Request Access) REFERENCES EDITOR NOTES These files are the unredacted version of WikiLeaks’ “Intolerance Network”. See also CitizenGo & HatzeOir databases Over 17,000 documents from right wing campaigning organizations Grupo CitizenGO & HazteOir hacked by ACABGang.

item.title: Citizengo & Hatzeoir Databases
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE CitizenGo & HatzeOir databases Database and site dumps from right wing campaigning organizations Grupo CitizenGO & HazteOir hacked by ACABGang in 2017. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRIES TYPE Hack SOURCE ACABGang FILE SIZE 22 GB DOWNLOADS (How to Download) MAGNET Link TORRENT Link DIRECT DOWNLOAD Link MORE REFERENCES EDITOR NOTES These files are the lost portion of the CitizenGo release and WikiLeaks’ “Intolerance Network”. Database and site dumps from right wing campaigning organizations Grupo CitizenGO & HazteOir hacked by ACABGang in 2017.

item.title: Conti Ransomware Chats
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE Conti ransomware chats Leaked onionchat, jabber and rocket chats from Conti ransomware operators, hackers and affiliates. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRIES TYPE Leak SOURCE FILE SIZE 7 MB DOWNLOADS (How to Download) MAGNET Link TORRENT Link DIRECT DOWNLOAD Link MORE REFERENCES EDITOR NOTES Thanks to vx-underground for collecting the material Leaked onionchat, jabber and rocket chats from Conti ransomware operators, hackers and affiliates. Retrieved from “https://ddosecrets.com/index.php?title=Conti_ransomware_chats&oldid=1318”

item.title: Council For National Policy
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE Council for National Policy An unredacted copy of the highly restricted September 2020 membership directory for the Council for National Policy, an umbrella organization and networking group for conservative and Republican activists in the United States. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRIES United States TYPE Hack SOURCE FILE SIZE 3.9 MB DOWNLOADS (How to Download) MAGNET Link TORRENT Link DIRECT DOWNLOAD MORE REFERENCES New York Times, The Nation EDITOR NOTES A redacted version from 2014 was previously published by the Southern Poverty Law Center and a redacted version of the 2020 list is available here.

item.title: Dept. For Church Charity And Social Service Of The Russian Orthodox Church
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE Dept. for Church Charity and Social Service of the Russian Orthodox Church Roughly 57,500 emails from the Russian Orthodox Church’s charitable wing. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRIES Russia TYPE Hack SOURCE FILE SIZE 15 GB MORE REFERENCES EDITOR NOTES Roughly 57,500 emails from the Russian Orthodox Church’s charitable wing. Due to the nature of the data, at this time it is only being offered to journalists and researchers.

item.title: Dnc Emails
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE DNC Emails Over 44,000 emails from the the US Democratic National Committee DATASET DETAILS COUNTRY United States TYPE Hack SOURCE Guccifer 2.0 FILE SIZE DOWNLOADS MAGNET TORRENT DIRECT DOWNLOAD Link MORE REFERENCES EDITOR NOTES The archive was manually compiled by DDoSecrets due to WikiLeaks’ decision to not make an archive available. Over 44,000 emails from the the US Democratic National Committee, hacked by Russian intelligence services and released under the pseudonym Guccifer 2.

item.title: Hart
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE HART Over 10 gigabytes of internal chats, documents and other files from the COVID misinformation group HART (Health Advisory & Recovery Team). DATASET DETAILS COUNTRIES United Kingdom TYPE Hack SOURCE FILE SIZE 10.2 GB DOWNLOADS (How to Download) MAGNET Link TORRENT Link DIRECT DOWNLOAD Link MORE REFERENCES EDITOR NOTES Over 10 gigabytes of internal chats, documents and other files from the COVID misinformation group HART (Health Advisory & Recovery Team), documenting non-public members and participants, “psych ops” and efforts to build influence campaigns targeting policy makers and the public with anti-masking and anti-vaccination propaganda.

item.title: Integrity Initiative
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE Integrity Initiative Integrity Initiative is a non-profit that counters Russian propaganda. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRY United Kingdom TYPE Hack SOURCE Anonymous FILE SIZE (Parts 1-6) 91.5 MB DOWNLOADS MAGNET (Parts 1-6) Link TORRENT Link DIRECT DOWNLOAD Link MORE REFERENCES Integrity Initiative EDITOR NOTES Integrity Initiative was a non-profit that counters Russian propaganda. It appeared to have confirmed the hack, but has not reviewed the individual documents.

item.title: Italian State Police
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE Italian State Police 1.35 Gigabyte of hacked from the Italian State Police, including details about wiretaps. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRY Italy TYPE Hack SOURCE Unknown FILE SIZE 1.1 GB DOWNLOADS MAGNET Link TORRENT DIRECT DOWNLOAD Link MORE REFERENCES EDITOR NOTES 1.35 Gigabyte of hacked from the Italian State Police, including details about wiretaps from Telcom Italia and confidential technical information about interception devices. The materials were ostensibly hacked by Anonymous.

item.title: Mosekspertiza

item.title: Municipal Court Of Princeton

DATASET DETAILS COUNTRIES United States TYPE Hack SOURCE Marketo FILE SIZE 28 GB DOWNLOADS (How to Request Access) MORE REFERENCES EDITOR NOTES Nearly 30 GB of appeal letters, accounting and audit information, amendment documents, tax information and chats. Limited Distribution Due to the PII in this dataset, the data is only being made available to journalists and researchers.

item.title: Patriot Front
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets RELEASE Patriot Front Over 400 gigabytes of leaked records from Patriot Front, a U.S.-based neo-Nazi organization with chapters around the country. This leak includes videos, photos, documents, and chat messages. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRIES United States TYPE Leak SOURCE Unicorn Riot FILE SIZE 440 GB DOWNLOADS (How to Download) MAGNET Link TORRENT Link DIRECT DOWNLOAD Link MORE REFERENCES A Guide To Patriot Front’s Leaked Media Files, Patriot Front Fascist Leak Exposes Nationwide Racist Campaigns, Unicorn Riot Far Right Investigations Desk, Rocket Chat archive EDITOR NOTES See also Patriot Front audio Over 400 gigabytes of leaked records from Patriot Front, a U.

item.title: Washington County Sheriff
